xml:
Oxis<tm tmtype="reg"/> Indications and dose

Chronic asthma

By inhalation of powder

  • Child 6–17 years

    6–12 micrograms 1–2 times a day (max. per dose 12 micrograms), occasionally doses up to the maximum daily may be needed, reassess treatment if additional doses required on more than 2 days a week; maximum 48 micrograms per day.

  • Adult

    6–12 micrograms 1–2 times a day, increased if necessary up to 24 micrograms twice daily (max. per dose 36 micrograms), occasionally doses up to the maximum daily may be needed, reassess treatment if additional doses required on more than 2 days a week; maximum 72 micrograms per day.

Relief of bronchospasm

By inhalation of powder

  • Child 6–17 years

    6–12 micrograms.

  • Adult

    6–12 micrograms.

Prophylaxis of exercise-induced bronchospasm

By inhalation of powder

  • Child 6–17 years

    6–12 micrograms, dose to be taken before exercise.

  • Adult

    12 micrograms, dose to be taken before exercise.

Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease

By inhalation of powder

  • Adult

    12 micrograms 1–2 times a day (max. per dose 24 micrograms), for symptom relief additional doses up to maximum daily dose can be taken; maximum 48 micrograms per day.

 Clinical medicinal product information Clinical medicinal product information
